reviewText: ...a basic training course for sound system technicians.  Clear, concise and practical.  Excellent video, special effects and sound production.  Topics range from review of how equipment works, how to set up different types of mics, how to mic instruments, how to set up different functions on the sound board, and more.  An important lesson is about the sequence of turning on the sound system to prevent blowing out the speakers or electronics.  Recommended for churches and other organizations.  Consider requiring completion of this training before someone is allowed to operate valuable sound systems.
Many good tips.  I could have used more detail.  The product was useful for the price.  I would buy it again, but realize that I would need more.
Ordered this training guide for our church and it is a great help in introducing other church members to operating the sound system.
